entry.title: Saturday: Chance of flurries. Temperature falling to minus 20 this morning then rising. POP 60%
entry.summary: Mainly cloudy. 60 percent chance of flurries early this morning. Wind east 20 km/h. Temperature falling to minus 20 this morning then rising. Wind chill minus 29 this morning and minus 24 this afternoon. Risk of frostbite. Forecast issued 05:30 AM CST Saturday 14 January 2023

entry.title: Saturday night: Periods of snow. Temperature steady near minus 15.
entry.summary: Cloudy. Periods of snow beginning this evening. Amount 2 to 4 cm. Wind east 20 km/h. Temperature steady near minus 15. Wind chill near minus 24. Forecast issued 05:30 AM CST Saturday 14 January 2023

entry.title: Sunday: Periods of snow. High minus 7.
